review.title: “Excellent team providing innovative building solutions in the commercial and residential sector.”
review.pros: Pros – The i-Frame wall product is revolutionary in bringing speed, energy efficiency, and consistency to new construction projects. The customer service is outstanding and each project is a calling card for future business.
review.cons: Cons – With only three years in business, the company still needs operational fine-tuning to maximize productivity.
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend – I'm optimistic about the outlook for this company
